description: This script performs health checks for a Vite development server, including process monitoring, port status, system resources, and crash detection.

methods.name: check_vite_process
methods.description: Checks if the Vite process is running and reports memory usage.

methods.name: check_system_resources
methods.description: Displays system memory, disk usage, and load averages.

methods.name: check_for_crashes
methods.description: Searches for recent Node.js crash core files in /tmp.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function orchestrating the health checks and outputting overall health status.
